module.name: VISAT Rich Client Platform
module.description: A desktop application used to open, browse, visualise, analyse and manipulate data products of a number of EO sensors.
module.changelog:
Changes in 2.0.0
[SNAP-14] Allow multiple selection when adding new layer
Changes in 1.0.1
[SNAP-17] Saving a product takes too long

toolView.title: Products View
toolView.description: Display all opened data products in a tree view.

toolView.title: Pixel Info View
toolView.description: Display detailed pixel information in a table view.

toolView.title: Vector Data Information
toolView.description: Displays attributes of selected vector data features.

toolView.title: Navigation
toolView.description: Zoom and pan a selected image view.

toolView.title: Mask Manager
toolView.description: Manage binary data masks and ROIs.

toolView.title: Pin Manager
toolView.description: Manage pins of a data product.

extension.toolView: org.esa.snap.visat.toolviews.placemark.gcp.GcpManagerToolView org.esa.snap.visat.toolviews.placemark.gcp.GcpManagerToolView GCP Manager c ctrl alt G Manage ground control points of a data product. /org/esa/snap/resources/images/icons/GcpManager16.gif /org/esa/snap/resources/images/icons/GcpManager24.gif showGcpManagerWnd/ HIDDEN SOUTH 0

toolView.title: Spectrum View
toolView.description: Display spectra at the current pixel position and for pins.

toolView.title: Information View
toolView.description: Display information for a selected band.

toolView.title: Geo-Coding View
toolView.description: Display Geo-Coding for a selected band.

toolView.title: Statistics View
toolView.description: Display Statistics for a selected band.

toolView.title: Histogram View
toolView.description: Display Histogram for a selected band.

toolView.title: Scatter Plot View
toolView.description: Display Scatter Plot for two selected bands.

toolView.title: Correlative Plot View
toolView.description: Display Correlative Plot for a selected band.

toolView.title: Profile Plot View
toolView.description: Display Profile Plot for a selected band.

toolView.title: World Map
toolView.description: Display product boundaries in a world map.

action.shortDescr: Create a new data product.
Open a data product.
Open a BEAM session.
Re-open a data product.
Opens the product grabber dialog to preview and open products.
Close an open data product.
Close the current BEAM session.
Save a BEAM-DIMAP data product.
Save a BEAM-DIMAP data product with a different name.
Save the current BEAM session.
Save the current BEAM session using a different name.
Import raster data
Import SAR data
Import Multispectral data
Import Generic File Formats
Import vector data
Exit the VISAT application.
Import a BEAM-DIMAP data product or product subset.
Import a data product or product subset from an ordinary RGB image.
Export Raster Data
Export the selected product to BEAM-DIMAP format.
Other Exports
Export the current view as an image.
Export the current view as Google Earth KMZ file.
action.popuptext: Export View as Google Earth KMZ...

action.shortDescr: Export the colour legend of the current view as an image.
Export the colour palette of the current view to a plain text.
Export the pixels of a mask as tab-separated text.
Export transect pixels as tab-separated text.
Export the currently displayed metadata as tab-separated text.

action.description: Exports the currently selected geometry as ESRI Shapefile.

action.shortDescr: Export an ENVI GCP (ground control points) file for image registration.
Edit properties of the selected object.
Edit user preferences.
Toggle visibility of various tool windows
Manage the position, size and docking state of tool windows.
Toggle tool bars visibility
Toggle visibility of the status bar.
Load the user layout.
Save the current layout as user layout.
Reset to initial layout.
Toggle visibility of the standard tool bar.
Toggle visibility of the analysis tool bar.
Toggle visibility of the layers tool bar.
Toggle visibility of the tools tool bar.
Toggle visibility of the views tool bar.
Open an image view for the selected band or tie-point grid.
Create a new band using an arbitrary mathematical expression
Applies a filter to the currently selected band and adds it as a new band.
Computes a "real" band from a virtual band or filtered band
Creates DEM elevation and optionally DEM-corrected lat/lon bands from a selected DEM

Computes actual pixel position minus pixel position computed from inverse geo-coding
and adds displacements as new bands (test for geo-coding accuracy).
Computes ASAR Normalised Radar Cross Section bands.
Attach a pixel based geo-coding to the selected product
Detach a pixel based geo-coding from the selected product
Create a new vector data container for drawing line and polygons.
Get the well-known-text (WKT) representation of a selected geometry.
Creates a geomtry from well-known-text (WKT) representation.
Displays information about the spatial area of the mask.
Group of Pre-Processing Steps
Group of Thematic Water Processing Steps
Group of Thematic Land Processing Steps
Group of Image Analysis Processing Steps
Group of Geometric Processing Steps
Apply a reprojection.
Apply an orthorectification.
Create a mosaic of multiple products.
Creates a product subset from the selected view.
Apply Data Flip
Opens the Sentinel home page with the default web browser.
Provides information how different data products are accessed.
Opens the module manager.
Displays information about SNAP.
Selection Tool
Zooming Tool
Pan Tool
Pin placing tool
Sets, edits or deletes ground control points
Line drawing tool
Rectangle drawing tool
Ellipse drawing tool
Polyline drawing tool
Polygon drawing tool
Determine the distance between two points
Creates a ROI mask using a magic wand
